title: is it bad im addicted to feedback and support pop up surveys.
body:
Is it bad when i end a game and the game gets 5 times better when i get a survey pop up, can i have some more 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Definitely not bad! Just means you really care about helping our game grow ^_^!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

For what it's worth, I'm definitely up to fill more survey than I'm currently receiving. I'm pretty sure Riot doesn't want to send too many surveys to the same player to avoid "survey fatigue", but if there is some way to signal our tolerance to survey, you can count mine as high.
Send some my way then my man. I've got really good ideas and feedback. I'm so proud of my Talon rework idea. (even if he isn't going to be reworked again)
